send_title: Send String to {{path}}. You can input `@file` to send a file or `@hex` to send by hex buffer.
send_hex_title: Send Hex to {{path}}. Please separate each byte with a space as `40 48 61 6e 63 65 6c`.
not_invalid_hex: It's a invalid buffer string. Please separate each byte with a space as `40 48 61 6e 63 65 6c`.
